attributes.action: help initiate an "I will help campaign", to encourage people to help others when they face violence or yobbish behaviour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I will help.

You should help.

We all should help combat antisocial behaviour and thuggery.  

Such a campaign would involve: not criminalising the members of public who come to the help of others and a public awareness and sticker programme to deter thuggish behaviour by making the would-be criminal aware that people will come to his victim's aid.

We all have a duty to help each other - only doing so in a determined manner will prevent and reverse the rapid spread of antisocial behaviour we see today.
